titles.title: Congratulating all of the individuals and organizations on the 15th anniversary of the launch of the Hubble Space Telescope that have helped make Hubble one of the most important astronomical instruments in history.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.

bill.summary: 4/28/2005--Introduced. Recognizes that results from the Hubble Space Telescope (the Hubble) have made extraordinary contributions to scientific research and education, and congratulates, on the 15th anniversary of the launch of the Hubble, all of the individuals and organizations that have helped make it one of the most important astronomical instruments in history.
